bug.summary: cluster configure command is not able to increase cluster size
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h4>Version</denchmark-h>
v0.21, v0.22 <denchmark-h:h4>Description</denchmark-h>
The cortex cluster configure command is not able to increase the max_instances specified for the cluster. <denchmark-h:h4>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
Increase max_instances in the cluster configuration file (e.g. cluster.yaml) Run cortex cluster configure -c cluster.yaml
